slide-1.title: How to Play
content: Dragon Tiger is played with two main cards (Dragon and Tiger) to determine which side has the highest value.

slide-2.title: Betting
content: You can bet on Dragon, Tiger, or Tie, and you can also bet on several side bets (Small/Big, Black/Red, Odd/Even).

slide-3.title: Results
content: The winner is the one whose total points are closest to 13. If the total points are the same between Dragon and Tiger, the result is a tie.
